attributes.action: Scottish football clubs have to offer away teams 20% of the tickets.
attributes.background: Insist that the Scottish football clubs have to offer away teams 20% of the tickets to maintain the great atmosphere at football games.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about football ticket sales are a matter for individual football clubs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
